name: MXLocationActivityMetric
desc: An object representing metrics about the use of location-tracking features of a device.

items.name: var cumulativeBestAccuracyForNavigationTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy for navigation.

items.name: var cumulativeBestAccuracyTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy.

items.name: var cumulativeNearestTenMetersAccuracyTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 10 meters.

items.name: var cumulativeHundredMetersAccuracyTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 100 meters.

items.name: var cumulativeKilometerAccuracyTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 1 kilometer.

items.name: var cumulativeThreeKilometersAccuracyTime: Measurement<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 3 kilometers.
